title: How to Copy Save Files to Another Wii

steps.title: Turn on the Wii with the save files that you want to copy.
steps.content: Turn on the Wii with the save files that you want to copy.

steps.title: Insert an SD card in the slot in the front of the console.
steps.content: Insert an SD card in the slot in the front of the console.

steps.title: Look at the top of the screen and make sure you are in the "Wii" tab.
steps.content: Look at the top of the screen and make sure you are in the "Wii" tab.

steps.title: Find the icon of the game that you want to copy.
steps.content: Find the icon of the game that you want to copy.

steps.title: This should copy the files to your SD Card.
steps.content: This should copy the files to your SD Card.

steps.title: Now go to the other Wii (where you want the save files at).
steps.content: Now go to the other Wii (where you want the save files at).

steps.title: Insert the SD card into the slot in the Wii.
steps.content: Insert the SD card into the slot in the Wii.

steps.title: Make sure you go to the "SD Card" tab.
steps.content: Make sure you go to the "SD Card" tab.

steps.title: Find the icon of the game that you want to copy.
steps.content: Find the icon of the game that you want to copy.

steps.title: The file should be saved.
steps.content: The file should be saved. Go to the Wii menu and play on the copied Wii file.
